sentences.en: "Wait a damn minute," Mindy spat. "Nobody said anything about staying overnight."
sentences.cn: “该死的，等一下”，明迪愤愤地说道，“谁也没说过要过夜。”
克拉默愤愤地骂了一句脏话。

sentences.en: He felt as if a serpent had spat venom into his eyes.
sentences.cn: 他感觉就像有一条蛇朝自己的双眼里喷射了毒液。
他用力咳了咳，吐了口痰。

sentences.en: He spat out "I don't like the way he looks at me."
sentences.cn: 他愤愤地说：“我讨厌他那样看着我。”

sentences.en: He spat out angry words at his tormentors.
sentences.cn: 他厉声地咒骂着折磨他的人.

sentences.en: He took a little cake and spat it out.
sentences.cn: 他吃了一点蛋糕,立即就吐了出来.

sentences.en: Larry rose excitedly to the edge of his seat, shook a fist at us and spat.
sentences.cn: 拉里气愤地挺直了后背，上半身前倾至座位边缘，边朝我们挥舞拳头边吐口水。

sentences.en: She spat the name out like an insult.
sentences.cn: 她像骂人似的说出了那个名字。

sentences.en: She surveyed him coldly with eyes that spat venom.
sentences.cn: 她冷眼打量着他,眼睛冒出怨毒的凶光.

sentences.en: She took a mouthful of food and then suddenly spat it out.
sentences.cn: 她吃了一口食物，突然又吐了出来。

sentences.en: The boy spat out the pill after eating off its sugar coating.
sentences.cn: 孩子吃掉药丸外面的糖,却把药吐了出来.
发动机发出劈啪声，接着是砰的一声响。
马达发出似咳嗽和呼噜的声音.

sentences.en: They spat at me and taunted me.
sentences.cn: 他们朝我吐唾沫，还嘲笑我。

trans.tran_en: a larval oyster or similar bivalve mollusc, esp when it settles to the sea bottom and starts to develop a shell
